ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are indebt to all previous and current lab members, too numerous to name, from the virology team and the UMR7257 for their contribution and help in the study of viral RNA replication and capping.

This work was supported in part through funding by the Fondation pour la Recherche Médicale (Programme Aide aux équipes), the Direction Générale de l’Armement (Contrat 07co404), the Infectiopôle-Sud, and the European Union Seventh Framework Programme (FP7/2007-2013) through the Project SILVER (Small Inhibitor Leads against Emerging RNA viruses, Grant Agreement No. 260644).
